Healing Potion.name: Healing Potion
Healing Potion.flavor: The taste and temperature vary drastically, seemingly adapting to the consumer's current needs and preferences.

Paralysis Draught.name: Paralysis Draught
Paralysis Draught.description: Throw the draught directly in front of you, paralyzing a foe.
Paralysis Draught.flavor: Skin exposure causes profound numbness and impaired motor control, quickly rendering the recipient effectively immobile.

Flamefroth Tincture.name: Flamefroth Tincture
Flamefroth Tincture.flavor: Though highly effective, frequent use incinerates phlegm and other particulates in the throat, causing embers and ash to accumulate around the mouth.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: Throw to deal damage at a distance.

Fibrous Net.name: Fibrous Net
Fibrous Net.description: Throw to ensnare a creature, paralyzing them.

Salvaging Kit.name: Salvaging Kit
Salvaging Kit.description: Salvage materials from the environment or from a creature.

Tunneling Tools.name: Tunneling Tools
Tunneling Tools.description: Use to descend to the next level.

Russ Talon.name: Russ Talon
Russ Talon.description: A claw shorn from a Russ. The marrow can be used as a base for potions and poisons.

Eidolon Mass.name: Eidolon Mass
Eidolon Mass.description: The indigestable remains left after an Eidolon's elemental meal. Has a number of unique uses.

Charshroom.name: Charshroom
Charshroom.description: The fibrous, carbon-rich mycelium of these mushrooms is highly flammable. The cloud of spores they release is indistinguishable from smoke.

Pebblepod.name: Pebblepod
Pebblepod.description: These plants incorporate loose sediment into a rocky shell for their seed pods. The pods also contain pockets of mineral-rich soil that can be used as fertilizer.

Tarrime Bloom.name: Tarrime Bloom
Tarrime Bloom.description: This flowering plant retains water using an adhesive liquid. Highly resistant to cold temperatures, it flourishes during winter months.

Windeelion.name: Windeelion
Windeelion.description: This large, mutated offshoot of a dandelion seems to generate small gusts of wind to carry its seeds.

Fulminating Gravel.name: Fulminating Gravel
Fulminating Gravel.description: Built-up arcane and static energies within this sediment make for a number of potential applications.

Bonder's Bulb.name: Bonder's Bulb
Bonder's Bulb.description: These small, stringy plants release a curative sap that was once used as a type of glue.

Pestail.name: Pestail
Pestail.description: The hard, regenerative tails of a Mortal Pester. Both the stony exterior and fleshy interior could likely be utilized.
